#summary Spell-checker and thesaurus

== Introduction ==

Spell-checker and thesaurus based on [http://nhunspell.sourceforge.net NHunspell]. The core [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hunspell Hunspell] is
used in `OpenOffice` and it works with dictionaries published on `OpenOffice.org`.

For description and other details see [http://farnet.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/RightWords/Readme.txt Readme.txt]
